# Preface {.unnumbered}

```{r, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE}
# Automatically create a bib database for R packages.
knitr::write_bib(c(.packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'),
                 'packages.bib')

knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
set.seed(123) 
```

Material for a introductory 1-week course in Data Science, taught at the University of Regensburg.

Day 1: Getting started, descriptive statistics, and graphics

Day 2: Hypothesis tests

Day 3: Linear regression (simple, multiple)

Day 4: Generalised linear models (GLM), Multivariate statistics

Day 5: Machine Learning, Data and project organisation

Link to the UR GRIPS course [here](https://elearning.uni-regensburg.de/course/view.php?id=54766) (requires UR account)
